statements: UPDATE ContentPerformanceMetrics SET views = 500, shares = 200 WHERE content_id = 'b52745f1-237c-483f-9754-1f0c7889b3fa';
UPDATE ContentPerformanceMetrics SET engagement = 3.5, views = 800 WHERE content_id = 'e5e97762-8060-4b3c-b136-df8a9c709fd6';
UPDATE ContentPerformanceMetrics SET views = 100, shares = 50, engagement = 0.75 WHERE content_id = '12234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef'
UPDATE ContentPerformanceMetrics SET engagement = 0.85, shares = shares + 10 WHERE content_id = 'aaabbbcc-1234-5678-9012-abcdefabcdef'
UPDATE content_performance_metrics SET views = 1000, engagement = 500 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE user_metrics SET views = 500, shares = 50 WHERE user_id = 123 AND content_id = 456
UPDATE content_performance_metrics SET shares = 100, engagement = 50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_metrics SET engagement = 75, views = 200 WHERE user_id = 101 AND content_id = 5;
UPDATE content_metrics SET views = views + 10, shares = shares + 5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_metrics SET total_engagement = total_engagement + 20, total_views = total_views + 15 WHERE user_name = 'John';
UPDATE content_metrics SET engagement = 500, views = 1000 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE user_metrics SET total_engagement = 300, total_shares = 150 WHERE id = 2
UPDATE content SET title = 'Updated Title 1', shares = shares + 1 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', username = 'New Username' WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE content SET views = views + 1, shares = shares + 1 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE views SET view_timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE view_id = 2;
UPDATE ContentPerformanceMetrics SET Views = 100, Shares = 50 WHERE ID = 1;
UPDATE UserMetrics SET TotalShares = 10, TotalEngagement = 7.5 WHERE UserID = 5;
UPDATE ContentPerformanceMetrics SET Views = Views + 100, Shares = Shares + 10, EngagementScore = EngagementScore + 2.5 WHERE ID = 1;
UPDATE UserMetrics SET TotalViews = TotalViews + 50, TotalShares = TotalShares + 5, TotalEngagement = TotalEngagement + 1.5 WHERE UserID = 3;
